title: (x) For the greatest gift of all - Bickham Script {Franz}
content: I have been searching everywhere for this font and have not had any luck. I want to use it for my wedding invitations which I hope to design myself. Any help would be greatly appreciated. Thank you! ![wedding invitation](http://web.archive.org/web/20050524130107im_/http:/www.typophile.com/forums/messages/83/32831.jpg) ![wedding toss](http://web.archive.org/web/20050524130107im_/http:/www.typophile.com/forums/messages/83/32832.jpg)
author: aspst22

comments.content:
That is what I thought...I downloaded that font but couldn't get it embellished like it is in this pics. The "b" and "h" letters don't have the swirls like these do. Do you know how I could achieve that?   
   
Thank you.

Those are the alternates that come with the font, see Adobe's [Glyph Complement](http://web.archive.org/web/20050524130107/http:/www.transaction-one.com/gs/html/a/adobe/fontstore/en/type/browser/pdfs/BICQ/BickhamScriptStd-Bold.pdf)

Thank you so much! You have no idea how excited I am to finally get this information.   
   
Again, your help is greatly appreciated!
You're very welcome, I wish you all the best for your wedding! ![:-)](http://web.archive.org/web/20050524130107im_/http:/www.typophile.com/forums/clipart/happy.gif)
